String.string: Inner Temperature
A strange aura is coming from inside the sanctum.
You can feel power emanating from the center of the Sanctum.
The gates will close soon.
Jump to knock off all the parasites!
Argon parasites cling to your body.
With the power of the Argons, I rise again!
You shall pay!
Kelsaik is faltering...
Kelsaik approaches.
Failed to balance temperature. The air in the battle area is unstable.
Raging Kelsaik is unstoppable.
Kelsaik grows stronger.
A Mana Field has activated. The battle area is corroding.
Battle area corrosion is speeding up.
Mana Field is fully powered.
Kelsaik has been defeated!
Frostbite Avatar
Blazing Avatar
Enough! You shall not leave this place alive!
Blazing and Frostbite Argon Priests approach.
The Argon Priest is trying to enrage Kelsaik.
The Argon Priest has been eliminated.
Kelsaik's avatar approaches. Collect the Argon Priest Essence and go to the leaping board.
Kelsaik's avatar has been eliminated.
Defeat the Argon Priest that matches the element to stop Kelsaik's rage.
You defeated the Frostbite Avatar. Frostshield is deactivated.
You defeated the Blazing Avatar. Blazeshield is deactivated.
You must escape before the wrath of the flame captures you.
You failed to defeat the Frostbite Avatar. The battle area will get dangerously cold.
You failed to defeat the Blazing Avatar. The battle area will get dangerously hot.
Kelsaik absorbs the raging flame aura.
Kelsaik absorbs the chilling frost aura.
Fools! That fire will do nothing!
Fools! That frost will do nothing!
The temperature rises!
The temperature drops!
Kelsaik is protected by the Frostshield and the Blazeshield.
All skill damage will decrease by 25% if the doom and shield attributes match.
Kelsaik is losing mana!
Decreases healing effects by 50% and cooldown of all skills by 25%.
Kelsaik is losing mana faster!
Mana drain at maximum.
The butterflies are creating falling chunks of amber.
Amber chunks will generate faster increases as time passes.
The number of amber chunks is increasing.
Amber chunks are falling.
More amber chunks are falling.
The falling amber chunks are out of control. This is the end.
